"Lisa":
"Let's use gunslashes and only gunslashes
this time. Slice and dice, shoot and shoot.
You get the picture."

"Still, no matter how good we get, our work
will always be the same. Shoot and kill, shoot
and kill! Hee hee hee!"

"All you have to do is have as much fun as
you can. That's my game plan, at least."
